snippet: Eli Manning, having been named the most valuable player of Super Bowl XLVI, was presented with a 2012 Chevrolet Corvette Grand Sport convertible on Sunday.
abstract: Eli Manning, having been named the most valuable player of Super Bowl XLVI, was presented with a 2012 Chevrolet Corvette Grand Sport convertible on Sunday.
lead_paragraph: Of the many media requests made of a Super Bowl M.V.P., some are less baleful than others.

keywords.name: organizations
